channel.title: Where do I download the Apollo RSPS source and client?
channel.description: nuff said in the title... "Where do I download the Apollo RSPS source and client?" A link would be nice... I'm looking forward to making a 2006 rsps, Please let me know what I should use.

item.title: Where do I download the Apollo RSPS source and client?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Native^:

Why does everyone want a new client… Really, there all the same.

Perhaps you could educate us on making clients compatible?

I was thinking of possibly, like when the client crashes due to a bad interface, etc. They could instead just not load it, instead of freezing the client or disconnecting the player.

Thoughts?

Read full topic
item.source: Where do I download the Apollo RSPS source and client?
